labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.short_description: discord crashes when changing windows's multiple displays settings while selecting a screen to share in a VC
data.steps_to_repro: - make sure your displays are set to extend in Display Settings - connect to a screenshare enabled VC - click on the screenshare icon turn it on and the and you should see the select a screen modal - change multiple Displays Settings to duplicate the screens - observe
